recipe_name: Artichoke, pepper and broad bean salad with lemon dressing
author: Nick Nairn
method: Combine the onion, pepper, artichoke hearts, chives, coriander and broad beans in a bowl. In a separate bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, olive oil and salt and freshly ground black pepper. Pour over the salad, stirring to coat everything. Serve.
ingredients: ¼ onion, very finely sliced,  ¼ red pepper, finely sliced,  4 artichoke hearts in oil, drained and cut into wedges,  1 tbsp chopped fresh chives,  1 tbsp chopped fresh coriander,  50g/1¾oz broad beans, skins removed,  ½ lemon, juice only,  3 tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
